research_municipality_step.notes: The City of Pearsall, Texas operates under a Council-Manager form of government. The Mayor and seven Council Members are elected at-large. The information on elected officials is primarily based on the Texas Municipal League City Officials Directory and the City of Pearsall's website. Some council members, Racheal Garza and Ramiro Trevino, were recently sworn in for new terms despite facing charges in an election investigation.
